phrases: TS-Note: Bet from where Ririko's Border Color comes from. (b-)b
She is the math teacher, Ririko-sensei.
Did not she start last week?
Do not go making such trivial comments.
I want her to teach me too!
Everyone, let us use the surface area of the circle to calculate the volume of this cone!
I do not understand any of this all of a sudden!
Aono Tsukune-kun, please try to solve this.
You do not even know how to do such an easy question!
Did you listen to my lesson?
You cannot space out you know.
If this continues, I will not be able to advance to second year!
You want me to teach you math?
Just by getting used to this school is already tiring me out.
And I always get dragged into lots of situations, so I could not concenrate well on studies...
Okay, if it is within my power.
If that is the case, could you come to my room tonight?
I am sure I can help you in many ways that way.
This is bad, if I go to Moka-san's room,
I-I-I t-totally will not be able to study at all!
I will also do my best for Tsukune.
I will do my best to help you, because...
You always let me suck your blood!
So it was because of that!
In 794, Heiankyou was made the capital of Japan.
If it is studying, then you should just do it with me.
Speaking of studying, that is my specialty!
Now now, Tsukune-san, let us study together!
I have not come to school in a while, so can I study with you guys?
I am really happy about everyone is feelings,
But it is still Moka-san that I want to...
Yes, that is right, it is better if all us study together!
Shall we go to the clubroom and study now?
To find the tangent line, in other words,
To find the slope at a certain point on a function f(x), you need to use differential calculus.
To find the area under a function g(x), on the other hand, you might divide the area into rectangles of area g(x)dx.
And that is the principle behing integral calculus.
How was it, did you understand it?
Yeah, as expected from Moka-san, your teaching is great!
Geez, you two are staring at each other again!
I really do not understand it, woof woof!
What is the difference between differentiation and integration and addition and subraction?
But seriously, Moka-san's notebook is really easy to understand.
Your writing is beautiful and your points are arranged neatly and makes it really easy to understand!
Ah, then let me write a copy for you!
I would feel bad though, Moka-san.
It is for your sake after all.
You guys are staring at each other too long.
Today, I studied so hard that I am exhausted!
Ah... we were just having a study group...
That is not good at all.
I acknowledge your passion for it,
But if lots of students gather together to study,
In the end everyone will just fool around and not learn anything at all.
Akashiya-san, you cannot help Aono-kun at all.
No matter how good your grades are,
You need a professional educator to teach someone else.
Aono-kun, please come to the remedial room tomorrow after school.
So, then, let us just skip to after school the next day.
It is the end of the day already...
I heard this from my 4th period class.
She may be very into education but,
She always gets too obsessed and goes overboard.
and it kind of pisses me off!
Feeling frustrated that those breasts you are so proud of are losing to someone else's?
Yukari-chan, you are the one that is a child, right?
It is better than something that is big and useless!
You idiot, my breasts are popular because of their softness, not their size.
My innocent flat chest is my selling point!
Shut up, you big breasted woman!
They will sag as you get older!
Even if it sags, it is still better than you, who has nothing at all!
Hey, what are the both of you doing?
Still, Tsukune, rather than going to remedial classes in the summer,
It is better if you work hard right now.
Yeah, if you do not get at least a 50 on the final,
You will have to sacrifice your summer vacation for remedial classes.
That is right, I completely forgot about it!
It is summer vacation right after exams!
Moka-san, I will do my best and get good grades!
And after that, let us have fun during summer!
Yeah, let us play some dangerous games then.
No, you must come and have a sweet and sour prepubescent experience with me!
Do you want to have some shaved ice of dawn?
Excuse me, I am here for remedial class.
I am Aono Tsukune from Class 1-3.
I have been waiting for you, Tsukune-kun.
My, I thought you would study better if I wore this outfit.
It will just because a ton of weird imaginations in my head!
Sensei, what are you trying to-
In the education system, teachers are respected leaders.
And on the other hand, students are the teacher's slave.
My, you have such a young and wonderful scent.
It is as if you were human.
But it is the first time I have smelled such a wonderful smelling student.
It will be interesting to see what I can teach you.
Now then, why do not we start, Tsukune-kun?
My after class lessons are very strict.
I wonder if Tsukune is working hard now.
You cannot help Aono-kun at all.
This should not be all I can do for Tsukune...
I am not ready for the test!
Furthermore, these are very difficult formulas we have not learned yet!
You are working really hard, Tsukune!
Even though Ririko-sensei said that stuff,
I thought I could still help Tsukune a bit.
So I made you a notebook for the test.
If you would like, I would like you to use it...
Amateurs should not do unnecessary things.
Using such a thing to tempt Aono-kun...
I am not tempting him or anything!
It is because of you people that Aono-kun has not been able to concentrate on his studies up until now.
So... it really was my fault that Tsukune has not been able to study?
Tsukune-kun, let us work hard together today too!
You should be gradually understanding the wonders of studying, right?
I get horny the moment I get a whiff of your scent!
I will teach you well today too!
Come, absorb till you have gotten enough of it!
While you are doing this, will you only think of your teacher and studying?
Sensei, what are you doing to Tsukune?!
Akashiya Moka, is it you again?
We are in the middle of some important studying.
There is a monster with an upper body of a human and a lower body of a snake.
That is the true form of Ririko-sensei: Lamia!
I have dedicated my entire life to teaching!
I definitely will not allow someone like you defile this place!
Now, let us continue studying, Tsukune-kun.
Trust in me, it is for your own good.
This is the trust between students and teachers!
Let me cool you down a bit...
You, who seldom comes to school, must be taught a good lesson!
How dare you do that, you bitch!
What I am doing is for your own good!
You cannot even understand this, you little bitch!
Then let me write a copy for you!
It is for you sake after all.
Come, receive my education and guidance!
Sorry, Moka-san, sorry it took for long for me to wake up.
You prepared a notebook for me, right?
Are you listening to your teacher?!
I will let you all receive education and guidance from me!
Once the rosary on her chest is removed,
The vampire blood within Moka will awaken.
Is this what you call education and guidance?
I am not your student, though.
You are intoxicated by being a teacher,
Let me give you true education and guidance!
This week's winner was decided in only 31 seconds!
Not showing any mercy at all.
And so, we move on to the day of the final exam!
I cannot do this... all the knowledge that Ririko-sensei absorbed into me is gone!
How did you feel about the test?
How do I put it... I tried my best...
But I will not regret it, no matter what the outcome is.
That is because even if it was only a few days, I was able to study together with you!
For not giving up and teaching me until the very end.
That notebook was also really useful, and having you with me really helped me!
There is a test tomorrow too!
And so, our first summer vacation has finally arrived!
I have to go to the extra lessons...
I even taught you so much...
Next, Summer Vacation and a Vampire,
